original: <color=#FFE787>回復時間：</color><color=#ccffcc>$Skill_CD(1031)@</color>召喚一個<color=#4cc769>狼顧結界</color>，並在 <color=#ccffcc>27</color> 秒內對我方全體武將強化 <color=#ccffcc>$Status_Str(4549)@</color> 點武力和智力，以及 <color=#ccffcc>25%</color> 爆擊率和爆擊傷害。同時對我方全體士兵強化 <color=#ccffcc>$Status_Str(4564)@</color> 點武力和智力，場上只能同時存在一個結界且新的結界會取代舊的，當結界被取代消失時效果也會跟著消失。
text: <color=#FFE787>Response time: </color><color=#ccffcc>$Skill_CD(1031)@</color>Summon a <color=#4cc769>wolfgu enchantment</color>, and in <color=#ccffcc>27</color> Strengthen all our generals within seconds <color=#ccffcc>$Status_Str(4549)@</color> Point of strength and intelligence, and <color=#ccffcc>25%</color> color> Critical strike rate and critical strike damage. At the same time strengthen all our soldiers <color=#ccffcc>$Status_Str(4564)@</color> point of strength and intelligence, only one enchantment can exist on the field at the same time and the new enchantment will replace the old one. When the enchantment is replaced and disappears The time effect will also disappear.
